fields.name: PersonName
fields.description: The Author's Name

fields.name: ORCID
fields.description: The Authors ORCID ID

name: month
description: The month in which the metrics took place

fields.name: unique_views
fields.description: The number of unique views

fields.name: count
fields.description: Count of events

fields.name: Book_Visits_BV_
fields.description: A Book Visit is registered each time a unique user views one of your books on Google Books. This number includes informational page views (such as the “About this book” page) as well as preview content page views

fields.name: BV_with_Pages_Viewed
fields.description: The number of Book Visits in which users accessed preview pages of your book. This doesn’t include visits where a user accessed only informational pages for your books

fields.name: Non_Unique_Buy_Clicks
fields.description: The number of clicks on links for purchasing the book on retailer websites (including your website, if you provided a buy link)

fields.name: BV_with_Buy_Clicks
fields.description: The number of visits which included a click on a purchase link

fields.name: Buy_Link_CTR
fields.description: The clickthrough rate for purchase links. The values are percentages

fields.name: Pages_Viewed
fields.description: The total number of unique preview content pages that a user viewed in a given session (counted as a 24-hour period)

fields.name: qty
fields.description: Quantity of sales

fields.name: Country_of_Sale
fields.description: Country in which sale occured

fields.name: qty
fields.description: Quantity of sales

fields.name: countries
fields.description: A list of Countries

fields.name: Total_Item_Requests
fields.description: Total number of item requests

fields.name: version
fields.description: Version of the OAPEN IRUS UK API, corresponds to the COUNTER report version

fields.name: title_requests
fields.description: The total number of title requests. Only available for data before 2020-04-01

fields.name: total_item_investigations
fields.description: The total number of item investigations. Only available for data since 2020-04-01

fields.name: total_item_requests
fields.description: The total number of item requests. Only available for data since 2020-04-01

fields.name: unique_item_investigations
fields.description: The number of unique item investigations. Only available for data since 2020-04-01

fields.name: unique_item_requests
fields.description: The number of unique item requests. Only available for data since 2020-04-01
